longDescription:
Across from Central Park: Across the street from Central Park, this New York hotel is 2 blocks from Fifth Avenue shopping, less than 3 blocks from Columbus Circle, and 8 blocks from Rockefeller Center.

View dining: Offering a residential ambience, Park Lane Hotel is home to an opulent restaurant and sophisticated bar, both with Central Park views. A fitness center, 10 meeting rooms, and concierge desk are additional highlights.

Flat-panel TVs and high-speed internet available: Picture windows in the 628 guestrooms frame city or park views. Rich color schemes complement gilded headboards and lively floral prints. All rooms include a 30-inch flat-panel TV and wireless Internet access (surcharge).

Rooms
The 46-story Park Lane Hotel has 601 guestrooms. All have picture windows facing the city or Central Park. Accent walls in deep colors provide a lively backdrop to floral fabrics and gilded headboards. Rooms feature 30-inch flat-panel TVs with movie and music channels. High-speed Internet access is also available. Bathrooms have marble counters, telephones, makeup/shaving mirrors, and bathrobes. Gilchrist & Soames bath products are provided. Other amenities include minibars, three multi-line phones with voice mail, and turndown service upon request. Cribs are available for guests' use.

Awards

  • This property is affiliated with the International Gay & Lesbian Travel Association (IGLTA) and welcomes lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender (LGBT) guests.

Dining
The Park Room - The restaurant at this New York hotel is an opulent, high-ceilinged room with arched windows overlooking the trees of Central Park. Breakfast and lunch are served. The menu is Continental with contemporary flair. Harry's Bar - This club-like bar and lounge is a tribute to the late Mr. Helmsley, whose portrait is displayed on the mahogany-paneled walls. Views are of Central Park and the hansom cabs of Central Park South.

Fees

  • The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.
    • Breakfast fee: USD 35 per person (approximately)
    • Valet parking fee: USD 58 per day
    • Pet fee: USD 100 per pet, per stay
    • Rollaway bed fee: USD 35 per night
  • The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

Location Highlights

  • Metro station nearby
  • In city center
  • In business district

Property Amenities
The Park Lane Hotel offers a desirable location across the street from Central Park, within 3 blocks of stylish Fifth Avenue and Madison Avenue shopping, and 8 blocks from Rockefeller Center. Columbus Circle and the Time Warner Center are about 2 blocks west. Broadway theaters are within 1 mile. Guests have complimentary access to the 24-hour fitness center, which offers bikes, treadmills, elliptical machines, and free weights. Two computer work stations with high-speed Internet access are available in the 24-hour business center. 10 meeting rooms are located at the hotel. Unlimited wireless Internet access for up to 6 devices per guestroom is in included in the daily resort fee. The hotel offers a complimentary reception each evening with hors d'oeuvres, wine, beer, bottled water, soft drinks, and snacks. A concierge desk can handle ticket and transport needs. Complimentary newspapers are available in the lobby, and complimentary luggage storage is available until 11 PM. This is a smoke-free property.

The recreational activities listed below are available in Central Park, directly across from the hotel; fees may apply.

The closest major airports to Park Lane Hotel are:New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 7.6 km / 4.7 miNew York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 8.7 km / 5.4 miNewark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18.9 km / 11.8 miThe preferred airport for Park Lane Hotel is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia). Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

Policies

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum check-in age is 18
  • Check-in time starts at 3 PM
  • Check-out time is noon
  • Pets allowed
  • Pet maximum weight in lb is 55.12
  • Maximum number of pets per room 2

  • Diners Club
  • Discover
  • JCB International
  • MasterCard
  • Visa

hotelMandatoryFeesText.name: Mandatory Fees and Taxes
hotelMandatoryFeesText.content:
• You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the hotel:
    • Deposit: USD 100 per night
    • Pet deposit: USD 100 per stay
    • Resort fee: USD 32.66 per accommodation, per night
  • The hotel resort fee includes:
    • Fitness center access
    • Business center/computer access
    • Internet access
    • Phone calls
    • Additional inclusions
  • We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.
